description.en-us: '84 Pontiac Firebird Debut series Muscle Mania Produced 2020 - Present Designer Brendon Vetuskey Number GHD08\n\nThe '84 Pontiac Firebird is a Hot Wheels casting which debuted in 2020. It was designed by Brendon Vetuskey as a replacement for the aging '80s Firebird casting with more detail and a specific model year including a T-Top. The foundation for the casting started from the K.I.T.T. and takes inspiration from one of several 1984 Pontiac Trans Ams that Brendon had owned.
